text: (visvasavantayini!) dharmaya ayat ayagen (mema dharmaya) pratiksepa karannanda, samanayan taba namadinnanda, (taman ata æti dæyata vada) usas dæyak obage deviyan oba veta pahala kirima gæna kæmati vanne næta. namut allah taman kæmati ayata tama varaprasadaya at kara denneya. allah imahat vu dayaluya
